comments: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 710
formula: E.g.f.: log(-1/(-1+x))^2*x^2.Recurrence: {a(1)=0, a(2)=0, a(3)=0, a(4)=24, (n^4-6*n^2-n^3+4*n+8)*a(n)+(7*n-2*n^3+n^2-6)*a(n+1)+(n^2-n)*a(n+2)}.a(n) ~ (n-1)! * 2*(log(n) + gamma), where gamma is Euler-Mascheroni constant (A001620). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 01 2013
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: New name using e.g.f., _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 01 2013
